meanings.definition: A word or phrase preceded by a hash sign (#), used on social media websites to identify messages on a specific topic.
meanings.sent1: On Twitter, people often use hashtags to group their posts about similar subjects.
meanings.sent2: She included several hashtags in her Instagram post to make it easier to find.
meanings.sent3: The hashtag party was a hit, with everyone sharing their favorite topics online.
meanings.sent4: The hashtags acted like signposts, guiding users to the trending discussions.
meanings.sent5: Remember to add hashtags to your posts so more people can join the conversation.

meanings.definition: A symbol used to mark keywords or topics in a social media post.
meanings.sent1: The hashtags in her tweet helped others discover her content quickly.
meanings.sent2: Using hashtags can increase the visibility of your social media posts.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly referred to the hashtags as secret codes for online detectives.
meanings.sent4: The hashtags were like bright labels, drawing attention to important information.
meanings.sent5: Don't forget to add hashtags to your photos for more likes and shares.
